pageSetting.title: 系统未使用行员信息明细

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $qsrq$ as qsrq,$jsrq$ as jsrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,lb.lbmc from khdx_hy hy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=jgcy.qsrq and $jsrq$<=jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join khdx_hylb lb on lb.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=lb.qsrq and $jsrq$<=lb.jsrq where not exists (select 1 from khdx_hy hy1 inner join xtb_yyrz yyrz on yyrz.hydh=hy1.hydh where hy1.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and yyrz.sjsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and yyrz.sjms like '%system/index%' ) and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and jg.jgdh='$jgdh$' and hy.hydh != 'admin' order by jg.jgdh,lb.lbmc,hy.hydh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $qsrq$ as qsrq,$jsrq$ as jsrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,lb.lbmc from khdx_hy hy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=jgcy.qsrq and $jsrq$<=jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join khdx_hylb lb on lb.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $qsrq$>=lb.qsrq and $jsrq$<=lb.jsrq where not exists (select 1 from khdx_hy hy1 inner join xtb_yyrz yyrz on yyrz.hydh=hy1.hydh where hy1.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and yyrz.sjsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and yyrz.sjms like '%system/index%' ) and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and jg.jgdh='$jgdh$' and hy.hydh != 'admin' order by jg.jgdh,lb.lbmc,hy.hydh ) t
